price: Y dicen: "¡Oh, tú [Mujámmad]! A quien se le ha descendido la revelación, eres un demente.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِي نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلذِّكۡرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuhā alladhī nuzzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru innaka lamajnūnun
